review: Loses connection frequently while streaming Netflix. Rebooting the device multiple times a day to keep video going is a real hassle. Device has to be rebooted at least once a day no matter what due to connection loss. No other wireless devices in the house have this issue. Fire stick is literally  less than 10 feet from the wireless router and has these network issues. Amazon really should have done more in house testing before releasing this device.I use a ASUS 802.11ac Dual-Band Wireless-AC1750 Gigabit router for reference.
